tier.item: He saw that it was burning
`They believed that he was a god'
`They believed that he was a god'

E88. káa hóop' u ko'n-ol-o'b pàal-il-tsil-o'b

I made you eat the meat.
Something is eaten; one eats things.
`Our Lord has come to save us.'
`Our Lord has come to save us.'
Our Lord has come to save us.
He saw that it was burning

`I am on a mat, on a chair.' (i.e. I govern.)

`With what did he cut the bread?'

`He cut the bread with a knife.'

NOT: `The man stood up.' (OK as `He stands like a man.' )
